title: Russia's expansion of power in Early Modern period

content.question: Which of the following contributed most to the emergence of Russia as an expanding Eurasian power in the period between 1450 and 1750?

choices.label: Its absorption of traditions and technology from the Byzantine Empire and western Europe
Its success in creating alliances with European powers to expel Turkish invaders from the south
The eradication of Islam from Central Asia
The fall of the kingdoms of Poland and Prussia
The use of its strong navy to acquire colonial holdings worldwide

content.answer: Its absorption of traditions and technology from the Byzantine Empire and western Europe

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
